Direct Known Subclasses:
Macro
public class CompoundProcedure
extends Procedure
implements Runnable

This class represents procedures defined in Scheme (nonprimitives).

Method Detail

apply

public Object apply(Environment appenv,                    Cons realargs)             throws SchemeException
Apply the procedure to some arguments. This is rarely used; instead the evaluator uses callEnvironment.
